description_list.description: The dataset includes pitch angle distribution (PAD) of low-energy ions measured by the LEPi instrument onboard the ERG (Arase) satellite, which are archived in the Common Data Format (CDF). The MGF Level-2 8 sec data is utilized to calculate the pitch angle from the ambient magnetic field. The data files can be accessed with various data analysis software such as SPEDAS as well as with web browsers.
